a.title: WCSD COVID-19 Short Term Family Plan 3/16/2020

div.a: WCSD COVID-19 Short Term Family Plan 3/16/2020

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Dear Parents and Community Members:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: As a school district, we have been closely monitoring the news and best practices regarding the spread of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19). At the direction of Governor Kim Reynolds, she is recommending schools in Iowa must close for four weeks. This closure will take effect on March 16. All extra-curricular activities will be canceled for the next four weeks.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The closure affects all school programming, including before- and after-school activities, all athletic and extracurricular practices and competitions, and all weekend events to include daycare.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: District administration will be discussing with teachers and staff the possibilities for e-learning plans for our students. If you have any questions, please contact your childs building principal. We understand we have some challenges regarding internet access in our community and we are trying to determine a viable solution.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: We are actively preparing to continue with school lunch services and will communicate when we will resume lunches. More details on school lunch will be provided in the coming days.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The coronavirus is thought to be spread via person-to-person contact through contaminated air droplets from coughing and sneezing by an infected person. As with controlling the spread of other viruses, we urge you to speak to your child about the following prevention measures:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 7pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Wash your hands regularly, especially after using the restroom and before preparing or consuming food. Using soap and hot water, wash for about 20 seconds. Be sure to also wash your fingertips.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 7pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Avoid coughing or sneezing into your hands or in the air. Always try to cough or sneeze into a tissue, then throw the tissue away. If you dont have a tissue, cough/sneeze into your arm.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 7pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: As much as you can, avoid touching your eyes, mouth and nose.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The symptoms of coronavirus are similar to the regular seasonal influenza and include fever, lethargy, lack of appetite, and coughing. Some people with coronavirus have reported additional symptoms, such as a runny nose, sore throat, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea. In some situations, the virus can develop into pneumonia.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Individuals who need medical care should call their medical providers to report their illness prior to seeking care at a clinic, physicians office, or hospital.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Parents of students exhibiting flu-like symptoms or staff exhibiting flu-like symptoms are asked to contact the County Health Department.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Please know that I understand that is will greatly impact our community and my heart is with you. I know the days ahead will be challenging for you and your family. We will do our absolute best to rise to the occasion and try to assist you in finding solutions going forward. May we all lean on each other in the days ahead. We will make it through this rough time. I will provide updates as I receive them to keep you informed.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Sincerely,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Willie Stone, Superintendent

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Estimados padres y miembros de la comunidad:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Como distrito escolar, hemos estado monitoreando de cerca las noticias y las mejores prcticas con respecto a la propagacin de la enfermedad por coronavirus (COVID-19). Bajo la direccin del gobernador Kim Reynolds, ella recomienda que las escuelas en Iowa deben cerrar por cuatro semanas. Este cierre entrar en vigencia el 16 de marzo. Todas las actividades extracurriculares se cancelarn durante las prximas cuatro semanas.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: El cierre afecta a toda la programacin escolar, incluidas las actividades antes y despus de la escuela, todas las prcticas y competencias deportivas y extracurriculares, y todos los eventos de fin de semana que incluyen guardera.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: La administracin del distrito discutir con los maestros y el personal las posibilidades de planes de aprendizaje electrnico para nuestros estudiantes. Si tiene alguna pregunta, comunquese con el director de la escuela de su hijo. Entendemos que tenemos algunos desafos con respecto al acceso a Internet en nuestra comunidad y estamos tratando de determinar una solucin viable.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Nos estamos preparando activamente para continuar con los servicios de almuerzo escolar y nos comunicaremos cuando reanudaremos los almuerzos. Se proporcionarn ms detalles sobre el almuerzo escolar en los prximos das.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Se cree que el coronavirus se transmite a travs del contacto de persona a persona a travs de gotitas de aire contaminadas al toser y estornudar por una persona infectada. Al igual que con el control de la propagacin de otros virus, le recomendamos que hable con su hijo sobre las siguientes medidas de prevencin.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Lvese las manos regularmente, especialmente despus de usar el bao y antes de preparar o consumir alimentos. Usando jabn y agua caliente, lave por unos 20 segundos. Asegrese de lavarse tambin las yemas de los dedos.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Evite toser o estornudar en las manos o en el aire. Siempre trate de toser o estornudar en un pauelo desechable, luego btelo. Si no tiene un pauelo, tosa / estornude en su brazo.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Tanto como pueda, evite tocarse los ojos, la boca y la nariz.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Los sntomas del coronavirus son similares a la gripe estacional regular e incluyen fiebre, letargo, falta de apetito y tos. Algunas personas con coronavirus han informado sntomas adicionales, como secrecin nasal, dolor de garganta, nuseas, vmitos y diarrea. En algunas situaciones, el virus puede convertirse en neumona.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Las personas que necesitan atencin mdica deben llamar a sus proveedores mdicos para informar su enfermedad antes de buscar atencin en una clnica, consultorio mdico u hospital. Se les pide a los padres de estudiantes que exhiben sntomas similares a la gripe o al personal que exhiben sntomas similares a la gripe que se comuniquen con el Departamento de Salud del Condado.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Tenga en cuenta que entiendo que esto tendr un gran impacto en nuestra comunidad y que mi corazn est con usted. S que los prximos das sern un desafo para usted y su familia. Haremos todo lo posible para estar a la altura de las circunstancias y tratar de ayudarlo a encontrar soluciones en el futuro. Que todos nos apoyemos en los prximos das. Vamos a superar este mal momento. Proporcionar actualizaciones a medida que las reciba para mantenerlo informado.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
